programme.title: Monkey Man
programme.desc: Action thriller directed by and starring Dev Patel. A nameless young man known only as Kid makes his living as a masked participant at a seedy underground fight club where he is beaten up regularly. But there is method in his madness, as he works toward exacting revenge against those responsible for his traumatic past Dev Patel - Director Dev Patel - Kid Sharlto Copley - Tiger Pitobash - Alphonso Vipin Sharma - Alpha Sikandar Kher - Rana Singh Sobhita Dhulipala - Sita Brahim Chab - King Kobra.

programme.title: Ruthless
programme.desc: After his daughter is murdered, a high school coach takes matters into his own hands and hunts down her killers. programme.title: There's Something in the Barn
programme.desc: Festive horror comedy starring Martin Starr and Amrita Acharia. After inheriting a house in the mountains of Norway, an American family ups sticks from California and relocates. However, their decision to convert the property's old barn into an Airbnb unwittingly disturbs the creature that lives there - and hell hath no fury like an angry barn elf Magnus Martens - Director Martin Starr - Bill Amrita Acharia - Carol Kiran Shah - Main elf Townes Bunner - Lucas Zoe Winther-Hansen - Nora Henriette Steenstrup - Liv.

programme.title: The Cinema List: Biopic
programme.desc: When life inspires film, the most incredible stories are told. Join us as we journey through some of our favourite biopics, from Sky Original film Lee to Goodfellas and Back to Black.

programme.title: Under the Boardwalk
programme.sub-title: Comedy, Musical, Drama, Animation, Music, Action, Family, Romance, Arts And Culture ║ 2023 ║ PG
programme.desc: Armen is a land crab who lives under a boardwalk at the Jersey Shore. When he falls for Ramona, a sea crab tourist, tensions between their friends and families rise. However, a storm casts the duo far from home, leading to an epic adventure which unites the divided community. programme.title: Absolution
programme.desc: Crime drama starring Liam Neeson. An ageing career criminal and former boxer discovers he has developed a neurodegenerative disease that gives him only months to live. programme.title: IF
programme.sub-title: Fantasy, Drama, Animation, Comedy, Family, Children's ║ 2024 ║ U
programme.desc: Part-animated comedy fantasy starring Cailey Fleming and Ryan Reynolds. Staying with her grandmother while her father is in hospital, young Bea discovers that she can now see strange creatures - which turn out to be people's imaginary friends, or "IFs". programme.title: Godzilla x Kong: The New Empire
programme.sub-title: Fantasy, Drama, Action, Sci Fi, Thriller ║ 2024 ║ 12A
programme.desc: Monster action adventure starring Rebecca Hall, Brian Tyree Henry and Dan Stevens. programme.title: The Da Vinci Code
programme.desc: Mystery thriller based on the bestselling novel by Dan Brown, starring Tom Hanks and Audrey Tautou. programme.title: Angels & Demons
programme.desc: Mystery thriller based on Dan Brown's forerunner to The Da Vinci Code, starring Tom Hanks and Ayelet Zurer. With the election of a new pope imminent, the Illuminati kidnap the four leading contenders and issue a coded message that they will murder the men and blow up the Vatican. Catholic leaders turn to Harvard symbolist Robert Langdon, who must put his uneasy relationship with the church hierarchy aside in an effort to crack the code and save the men's lives Ron Howard - Director Tom Hanks - Robert Langdon Ewan McGregor - Camerlengo Patrick McKenna Ayelet Zurer - Vittoria Vetra Stellan Skarsgård - Commander Richter Pierfrancesco Favino - Inspector Ernesto Olivetti Nikolaj Lie Kaas - Mr Gray / Assassin Armin Mueller-Stahl - Cardinal Strauss Thure Lindhardt - Chartrand David Pasquesi - Claudio Vincenzi Cosimo Fusco - Father Simeon.

programme.title: Arthur's Whisky
programme.desc: When Joan's husband dies, she discovers he'd invented an anti-aging elixir that literally takes the years off. Sharing it with her friends Linda and Susan, the rejuvenated women waste little time in painting the town red, but they soon realise it's a very different world to the one they remember. programme.title: The Terminal
programme.desc: Comedy drama directed by Steven Spielberg, starring Tom Hanks and Catherine Zeta-Jones. programme.title: The King's Speech
programme.desc: Oscar-winning historical drama starring Colin Firth, Helena Bonham Carter and Geoffrey Rush. As part of his royal duties, Prince Albert is required to speak at public events, a task made all the more difficult owing to his severe stammer. The death of his father and subsequent abdication of his older brother means that "Bertie" is to be crowned king. Unconventional speech therapist Lionel Logue is enlisted to help the future George VI find his voice - and despite Logue's disregard for all things stately, the two men form an unlikely bond Tom Hooper - Director Colin Firth - \Albert\, King George Vl Helena Bonham Carter - Queen Elizabeth Geoffrey Rush - Lionel Logue Guy Pearce - \David\, Edward Vlll Michael Gambon - King George V Timothy Spall - Winston Churchill Jennifer Ehle - Myrtle Logue Derek Jacobi - Archbishop Cosmo Lang Claire Bloom - Queen Mary Anthony Andrews - Stanley Baldwin Tim Downie - Duke of Gloucester Eve Best - Wallis Simpson Freya Wilson - Princess Elizabeth Ramona Marquez - Princess Margaret.

programme.title: The King's Speech
programme.desc: Oscar-winning historical drama starring Colin Firth, Helena Bonham Carter and Geoffrey Rush. As part of his royal duties, Prince Albert is required to speak at public events, a task made all the more difficult owing to his severe stammer. The death of his father and subsequent abdication of his older brother means that "Bertie" is to be crowned king. programme.title: Black Hawk Down
programme.sub-title: Documentary And Factual, War, Drama, Action, History ║ 2001 ║ 15
programme.desc: War drama based on real events, starring Josh Hartnett, Ewan McGregor and Tom Sizemore. programme.desc: Drama based on a true story directed by Steven Spielberg, starring Eric Bana and Daniel Craig. Following the assassination of 11 Israeli athletes at the 1972 Olympic Games in Munich, Israel's Prime Minister Golda Meir recruits a hit squad to track down and execute the 11 Palestinian leaders held responsible for the atrocity. programme.title: Harold and the Purple Crayon
programme.sub-title: Action, Family, Drama, Animation, Comedy, Fantasy, Children's, Sci Fi ║ 2024 ║ PG
programme.desc: Harold and pals Moose and Porcupine live in a hand-drawn world of limitless possibilities. The trio become concerned when the Old Man, who narrates their illustrated existence, suddenly falls silent. Using his magical crayon, Harold draws a door to the real world and tumbles into the present day as a flesh-and-blood man, who collides head-on with widow Terry and her young son, Mel. Family adventure, starring Zachary Levi, Lil Rel Howery, Zooey Deschanel and Benjamin Bottani Carlos Saldanha - Director Zachary Levi - Harold Lil Rel Howery - Moose Zooey Deschanel - Terry Benjamin Bottani - Mel Tanya Reynolds - Porcupine Jemaine Clement - Gary Alfred Molina - Narrator Camille Guaty - Junior Detective Silva.

programme.title: Afraid
programme.sub-title: Horror, Mystery, Thriller, Drama, Sci Fi ║ 2024 ║ 15
programme.desc: Computer engineering company executive Curtis is coerced into testing a new digital assistant named AIA to secure a lucrative business contract with two tech geniuses. programme.title: Skincare
programme.desc: Small business owner Hope Goldman performs facials to celebrity clientele and powerful businesswomen. She is poised to launch her own skincare line, but is in arrears with rent on her store at a shopping complex. A rival called Angel opens in close proximity and soon after, her email is hacked and tyres slashed. Hope is convinced that Angel is the culprit and enlists hired thug Armen and young beau Jordan to extinguish the competition. programme.desc: Lily Bloom returns to her childhood home of Plethora, Maine, to attend the funeral of her father, the former town mayor who beat his wife behind closed doors. Upon returning to Boston, Lily is attracted to Ryle Kincaid, a neurosurgeon with a dark side, and old flame Atlas Corrigan. programme.title: Harold and the Purple Crayon
programme.sub-title: Action, Family, Drama, Animation, Comedy, Fantasy, Children's, Sci Fi ║ 2024 ║ PG
programme.desc: Harold and pals Moose and Porcupine live in a hand-drawn world of limitless possibilities. The trio become concerned when the Old Man, who narrates their illustrated existence, suddenly falls silent. Using his magical crayon, Harold draws a door to the real world and tumbles into the present day as a flesh-and-blood man, who collides head-on with widow Terry and her young son, Mel. programme.title: Skincare
programme.desc: Small business owner Hope Goldman performs facials to celebrity clientele and powerful businesswomen. She is poised to launch her own skincare line, but is in arrears with rent on her store at a shopping complex. A rival called Angel opens in close proximity and soon after, her email is hacked and tyres slashed. Hope is convinced that Angel is the culprit and enlists hired thug Armen and young beau Jordan to extinguish the competition. programme.title: S/Lge 24': Highlights
programme.desc: A contest from the 23rd round of the 2024 Betfred Super League season with top-six hopes at stake, as Leeds Rhinos host Catalans Dragons at AMT Headingley Stadium. (23.08).

programme.title: S/Lge 24': Highlights
programme.desc: In a huge game at the top of the table, fourth-placed St Helens host a table-topping Hull KR in the Betfred Super League. Willie Peters' side are now six games undefeated. (24.08).

programme.title: S/Lge 24': Highlights
programme.desc: League leaders Hull KR, looking to make it eight wins from eight, host Salford in the Betfred Super League. The Robins have won their last six home meetings with the Red Devils. (30.08).

programme.title: Fight Night: Jonas v Price
programme.desc: Natasha Jonas and Lauren Price headline a historic all-women's card at the iconic Royal Albert Hall, as the British pair collide in a world welterweight division unification fight. (07.03).

programme.title: S/Lge Highlights

programme.title: S/Lge Highlights
programme.desc: During the opening round of the Betfred Super League, Leeds Rhinos face Salford Red Devils. Both sides enter this campaign with renewed vigour after disappointing 2023 campaigns. (16.02).

programme.title: S/Lge Highlights
programme.desc: Hull KR play host to Leeds Rhinos in the Betfred Super League. Two tries from Ash Handley got Leeds over the line in their opener, while the Robins stormed to victory over Hull FC. (22.02).

programme.title: S/Lge Highlights
programme.desc: Warrington Wolves play host to Hull FC in the 2024 Betfred Super League. Sam Burgess' side went down to a 12-man Catalans previously, while Hull FC lost 0-22 to Hull KR at home. (23.02).

programme.title: S/Lge Highlights

programme.title: S/Lge Highlights
programme.desc: Hull KR host Warrington Wolves in the Betfred Super League. Previously, Hull were denied three from three in defeat at Salford, while Sam Burgess' side secured back to back wins. (07.03).

programme.title: S/Lge Highlights
